name: STATIC (itch) (illucinatestudios)
description:
Traverse through the levels of STATIC, interact with trinkets and NPC's and uncover the dark stories that lie within.

------------------------------------------

Thank you for playing!

This game is my final project for my course in animation, it is the first game I have ever made on my own. The game itself is based around mental health, as we had to chose a topic for our final project. I hope you enjoy and I look forward to hearing any feedback you may have! 

(This game does not have an ending as of yet, and would be described as more of a "demo". I have plans to update and keep working on the game in the near future, so stay tuned to find out what's next!)

Planned update 1 - 

- Fine tune the camera and other basic game mechanics

- Refine and add more story text and NPC interactions

- Redo the music and sound effects (I plan on creating my own music and sounds)

- Add final level
